item.title: FawnRun
item.description:
About This Game

FawnRun
A casual mini-game with very simple controls.
You'll need to focus on dodging all moving objects and successfully picking up random fawn icons, up to 100!
The screen you see is the only level of the game, there are no upgrades, no more levels, no tight time requirements.

How it works:
A/D: Control movement
W: Control the jump
ESC: Pause the game

PS: Please be patient, calm, and move actively.If you can't pick up the fawn icon in the first place, don't worry about it, because the icon will reappear in a certain position in a short time.

End Conditions:
1. Hit any moving object!
2. Close the game!

Clearance Conditions:
1. Collect 100 fawn icons!

Have fun!

item.title: TELETEXT
item.description:
About This Game

WELCOME, VIEWER!

WANT TO HAVE YOUR FUTURE FORETOLD? PASS TIME PLAYING GAMES? WIN PRIZES?



WE HAVE IT ALL. AND A BIT MORE, TOO. WHY NOT TAKE A LOOK AT WHAT OUR TELETEXT PROGRAMME HAS TO OFFER DURING YOUR AD BREAK?

  • A reactive world - Your actions will have consequences
  • Multiple Endings

item.title: Â°ûÂõæÊ†ºËéâÂ®úÂè∑Sertorgina
item.description:
About This Game

About this game:
Sertorgina is a top-down shooter game that uses a variety of weapons and accessories to create different shooting effects. The game revolves around a space traveler who is drawn into a black hole and transported to an unknown space, creating an imaginary alien world. As a creature that accidentally enters this world, the player will resist wave after wave of enemy attacks, defeat enemy ships, and survive.
Special combat method
Attack by using more points than enemy ships

Different shooting effects
Various weapons and accessories can be combined to produce different effects

item.title: Nebula Nomads
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a thrilling cosmic journey with Nebula Nomads, the 2.5D space ecommerce game that puts you in command of interstellar cargo haulers. Pilot your space ships through the vastness of the universe, navigating challenging environments and mastering the art of thrust vectoring inspired by classics like Lunar Lander.

Your mission: haul valuable packages between space stations to earn financial rewards. Use your hard-earned credits to unlock new ships and upgrades, enhancing your abilities and opening up new opportunities for exploration. The universe is your playground, but success requires skillful navigation and strategic decision-making.

Key Features:

Unique 2.5D space ecommerce gameplay: Navigate and master thrust vectoring to deliver packages across space stations.
Expansive universe: Explore a richly detailed cosmic landscape filled with challenges and opportunities.
Ship customization: Upgrade your fleet with new ships and enhancements to tackle increasingly complex missions.
Financial strategy: Manage your earnings wisely to optimize your fleet and reach new frontiers.

Prepare for a spacefaring adventure like no other. Nebula Nomads awaits your command ‚Äì are you ready to carve your legacy among the stars?

item.title: Mysterious prophecy
item.description:
About This Game

This is a parkour game that is not just about running, but about climbing, jumping, and crossing all obstacles, constantly running forward.
Under the blue sky, there are obstacles ahead and pursuers behind. You need to cross all obstacles while avoiding attacks from behind and keep running forward. The operation is simple, just move left and right, jump up and down, and pay attention to the timing to avoid obstacles in a timely manner.
Contrary to the tense and thrilling feeling that most parkour games have, this game gives a particularly relaxed feeling.
The graphics style of the game is very similar to an ink wash painting, without any unnecessary buttons or text. The painting style is simple, and the graphics are fresh and cute. Hurry up and challenge your friends!

item.title: JKEnterprises
item.description:
About This Game


Choose a megacorporation and engage your competitors in battle across the galaxy.


Select your faction's orbital station and construct an offensive fleet.


Guide your ships to victory against the enemy.

item.title: Black silk girl
item.description:
About This Game

It's a casual whack-a-mole like game with lots of pictures of girls, and when the block turns red, click on it. You can remove it, remove all the squares, you can see the girl's face.

‚ô¶ There were 18 girls, all very beautiful.
‚ô¶ There will be a girl's voice in the game, which is very attractive.
‚ô¶ Good background music accompanies the whole game.
‚ô¶ Conscience price, you can see 18 girls.

item.title: Hawaii Detective: Killing of a Krypto King
item.description:
About This Game

When crypto billionaire Hamish McNeil is reported to have vanished out at sea during a yacht party off the coast of Oahu, it‚Äôs considered an unfortunate, yet highly unlikely, accident. However, when his body turns up on Waikiki beach the next day with very strange markings on his legs and back it‚Äôs immediately clear that the Crypto King was not a victim of the high seas but instead of a gruesome and premeditated murder.

"Hawaii Detective: Killing of a Krypto King" is a Detective Mystery Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim where you play as Detective Laura Ko as she interrogates suspects, investigates clues and follows leads to determine who killed the Glaswegian Krypto King, and maybe even find some lesbian romance along the way. Featuring:


- A gripping and thrilling storyline
- Beautiful Anime Style Art
- Cool smooth jazz and Hawaiian fusion soundtrack
- Multiple romanceable characters and endings

item.title: Roads Of Rome: Portals 2 Collector‚Äôs Edition
item.description:
About This Game

A group of brave warriors of Rome and their accompanying workers continue to explore the mysterious worlds connected by ancient portals. An evil magician named Armagon again stands in their way. However, the Romans have a mysterious helper. Who is this?

Game features:
40 colorful levels and one bonus level;
Very familiar, but improved gameplay;
4 difficulty modes;
Multi-click mode;
2 object selection modes.
Hard-to-find caches.

Collector's Edition:
8 additional levels;
Desktop wallpapers;
Music track;
Cache maps for all levels.
Automatic guide for completing levels.

item.title: Y. Village - The Visitors
item.description:
About This Game

STORY


Batu, plagued by recurring nightmares of an unknown village, finds his life upended by a mysterious letter left at his doorstep one day. The letter bears a chilling message: "Do you wish to be free from your nightmares? We await you..."

The next day, the mystery deepens with the arrival of a second note revealing the name of the village: "Y. Village." Unsure of who beckons him and wary of potential dangers, Batu gathers a group to venture to the village. However, as they approach its boundaries, they're confronted by an unsettling figure in a gas mask, instilling fear in the group. All but Batu are consumed by terror, for he claims he cannot see this person. Believing his friends to be hallucinating from fear, Batu presses on.

Now, only one friend remains by Batu‚Äôs side as they journey into the village. They're welcomed by Hasan, a hospitable local. Everything seems ordinary until Batu awakens in the night to a piercing siren, revealing the village's true horrifying nature. For his friend is no longer in bed and has vanished.

Can Batu locate his friend, unravel the village's mystery, and escape? What has drawn Batu to this village? What secrets await to be unveiled in the village? In this village filled with mysteries, what startling conclusion awaits Batu?

ABOUT THE STORY


The narrative within the game is inspired and adapted from a true event.

The game's screenplay was penned by a professional horror film screenwriter. (Batuhan G√ºnd√ºz)

THEME


The village in the game has been designed based on a real-life village. It is a completely real place.



Many of the houses in the game were specially crafted for this experience.

The game features over 10 village houses.

Due to the game being rooted in a real event and location, significant effort has been invested to bring this unique experience to players.

GAMEPLAY


The game is a single-player first-person experience.

To progress in the game, remember to read the notes and watch the cassette tapes.

SENSITIVE CONTENT


Due to sudden loud noises and terrifying characters, this game is not recommended for individuals who are easily startled or sensitive.

item.title: Time Machine Bronzeville
item.description:
About This Game


Explore the dynamic cityscape around East 47th St. and South Parkway Blvd - the heart of Bronzeville - on Chicago‚Äôs South Side, as it was between the World Wars. Encounter heroes and scoundrels, survivors and thrivers, in 3D interactive scenes that transport the visitor into detailed recreations of this vanished community.

It was a time shaped by the Great Depression, Jim Crow segregation, and a burgeoning Chicago Renaissance in music and the arts, commerce and culture. It was the time of the Great Migration of thousands of African Americans as they fled the harsh realities of the South for the hope of a better life in the cities of the North and West.

Enter the Time Machine Bronzeville gallery and encounter a large tabletop Diorama displaying the recreated cityscape at the heart of Bronzeville. Take a stroll around the diorama and examine actual and imagined Bronzeville locations, animated with people and activity. See the archival photos and media and audio recreations that add authenticity to the experience that is, at once, arresting and immersive.

Click on any of dozens of diorama locations to reveal Popup Panels that include informative text, archival photos and audio recreations describing the places and their significance. Activate the Spyglass feature to take a closer look at the cityscape. At street level, you‚Äôll encounter some of the characters and sounds that animate this vibrant community.

Take a ride on the Bi-plane with its undulating banner announcing, ‚ÄúCarnival Today!‚Äù. Get a birds-eye view of the neighborhood. Jump into the Jitney Cab and take a scintillating night ride through the streets of Bronzeville. View the cityscape from the L- Train to get a ‚ÄúSouth Side‚Äù perspective of the now-vanished cityscape.

Turn your attention to the gallery walls lined with dozens of black and white photographs and framed colored scenes. These are the portals to the Storyworld. Click on the photos or enter the scenes to see and hear the stories that helped shape America in the 20th century.

There is a lot to see and discover (and surprises to reveal) as you proceed on your journey in Time Machine Bronzeville. The Achievement Dashboard will keep track of what you have discovered and give hints as to what more there is to explore. Collect all of the Markers on the Diorama and the Gallery Storyworld and become the official Mayor of Bronzeville.

Explore‚Ä¶ Discover‚Ä¶ Be Surprised. Welcome to Time Machine Bronzeville

item.title: A Christmassy Christmas
item.description:
About This Game

OVERVIEW
A Christmassy Christmas is an Arena Roguelike Survival game where Santa is on a rampage wiping out the population of Naughty Children. Wield the reins as Santa, in a dance of survival so vital. His duty, a twisted chore, fight to keep the legend alive evermore.

Christmas may be over, but Santa still needs your help! Come and play to keep the festive spirit alive and assist Santa in fulfilling his sacred duties.



UPGRADES

Santa is not one to go into battle unprepared. After collecting enough Souls of the Naughty Children, Santa can repurpose them as a source of power. The Souls fuel Santa's Magic, allowing him to summon more powerful attacks of his choice.



CROSS OFF ALL NAUGHTY NAMES

In the abyss where Naughty deeds persist, Endure until each name is crossed off the list. Eternally erased, in shadows they twist, Fates sealed in darkness, a final tryst.



HOW TO PLAY

Keyboard & Mouse
WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
LEFT SHIFT or SPACE to dash!
Use your mouse or touchpad to select upgrades or menu items.

Your goal as Santa is to survive for 6 minutes, this may sound easy, but the government will throw everything they have at you in order to take Santa down, including their super secret weapon... Mecha-Santa...

Very few have survived an encounter with Mecha-Santa, and even less have killed him.

SAVING PROGRESS!

This game supports saving! After a round of playing, you can purchase permanent upgrades that will auto save when you close the app.

ENJOY!

I hope you find plenty of enjoyment going down this dark road as Santa. I am a solo indie dev practicing Game Design. Feedback & Suggestions are always appreciated.

item.title: Outcast Tales: The First Journey
item.description:
About This Game



The First Journey is just the beginning of a much grander experience (as the name sort of implies!). So, for now, familiarize yourself with the wasteland - you'll spend a lot more time in it when Outcast Tales is out!

Be tactical (or mash buttons; might work just as well)!



Robots, mutants, desert raiders: almost all enemies have something up their sleeve. So do your characters: some abilities are most effective in combination with others. Find your opponents' weaknesses, humiliate them on the battlefield, and never ponder the moral implications of your actions!

Use your strengths (if you can find any)!



Combine class and personality types to give each of your characters a unique set of abilities. A Preacher Mercenary and an Antihero Mercenary will behave quite differently. Create a balanced crew, or just try out the wildest combinations to see how they turn out!

Overcome challenges (or mess everything up)!



Your characters will encounter dozens of unique situations that test their skill and wits. The Pacifist might talk his way out of trouble, the Egghead might try setting up traps, and the Daredevil will most likely just start blasting! In Outcast Tales, there are no wrong answers.

Develop relationships (like in a dating game, but not quite)!



Your characters can develop deep bonds or even fall in love - but can also come to despise each other, all depending on your actions. Your journey can become a wholesome story about newfound friendship, or a gruesome tale of three strangers constantly at each other‚Äôs throats. Whatever sounds more fun‚Ä¶

item.title: Chronique des Silencieux
item.description:
About This Game

Set in 1970s southern France, you play a rookie private eye tasked to dig out the secrets of a stubborn old man. Think on your feet while you follow your leads : ask questions to witnesses, detect their lies, hypothesize why and finally confront the silent ones running from their past.

A strange request

You are entrusted with the peculiar case of Victor Dousvalon. This old history professor is known for shrouding his past life in secrecy for everyone around, including his own daughter Catherine. But an apparently harmless accident decides him to hire you to help Catherine trace back the steps of his life.

Why does he not simply tell himself his own story¬†?

Why does Catherine, who has been so distant with her father these past years, suddenly wants to know¬†about him?

Your first case will decidedly be a delicate one...

Anything goes to break the silence!

Get engrossed in the handy work of a detective : search through family papers, ask personal questions, call at inopportune times and be generally nosy.


Head First Investigation

No watching characters think for you, this is your time to prove your deductive powers. Choose leads, follow them to the end or stop when you think you‚Äôve got the right idea. But you'll need to be convincing to push the silent ones to talk!


People‚Äôs History

Piece together the lives, the choices and the tragedies people are running from and walk a mile in their shoes.
Discover History, not from a bird‚Äôs eye view, but from the ground, where folk have to continue living and coping, each in their own unique way.

item.title: Ludicrous Leap
item.description:
About This Game

Are you up for a Ludicrous challenge with a side of adventure?

Step into a Ludicrous world where your platforming skills will be put to the test!

In this time-based platformer, you'll need to Run, Jump, Climb, Roll, and Sprint your way to victory as you navigate through several challenging levels and unique zones along your journey. Fun may quickly turn to frustration as the levels and obstacles you encounter become progressively more Ludicrous...

Advance your way through each level, then return to achieve the bronze, silver, and gold times!

item.title: Cards Survivors
item.description:
About This Game



Cards Survivors is a unique mix of card games, action games and roguelikes. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, and survive as long as you can!

FEATURES


  • Two game modes
  • Dynamic deck building
  • Unlock new cards, characters and relics
  • Endless replayability
  • World ranking
  • Accessibility options

TWO GAME MODES


Roguelike mode: Climb the tower, ascending its floors through three acts, encountering many enemies, bosses, and events along the way. The paths through each act all lead to a final floor where a challenging boss encounter awaits. The content of each floor and the available paths through each act are procedurally-generated, so each run will be a different experience.



Survivors mode: Fight relentless hordes consisting of hundreds of monsters, defeat the bosses and get into the world ranking. How many hordes will you survive?

DYNAMIC DECK BUILDING


Choose your cards wisely! Discover dozens of cards to add to your deck. Select cards that work together to efficiently dispatch foes and reach the top.

POWERFUL RELICS


Powerful items known as relics can be found while in battle. The effects of these relics can greatly enhance your deck through powerful interactions.

ENDLESS REPLAYABILITY


Cards Survivors offers endless replayability! Test your skills and improve your score!
